basics.summary: Curious, open-minded, no-ego doers, good team-player

Active participation in the recruitment of team members

work.summary: Website building chatbot powered by AI
highlights: Reduced time to render the Heek editor by 80\% (5s -> 1s) by using server-side rendering
Improved the productivity of the marketing team by designing a web framework to meet their needs
Identified and fixed several critical bugs on the server-side using debugging tools
Learned to work in a team using agile methods

work.summary: Translate signs and printed material into multiple languages
highlights: Implemented a BaaS server allowing user's multi-account management compatible with multiple providers
Built a hybrid mobile app capable of taking advantage of the smartphone hardware capabilities such as GPS, NFC and vibrations for visually impaired people
Managed interoperability between databases to extend the capabilities of the QR Translator service
Designed and implemented a modern intranet site to present the SEM team within the company
Implemented a blog application with rights management, file upload and a real-time commenting system
Contributed to open-source side projects during the learning process

projects.name: Smart Waste Management prototype
projects.summary: Improve the waste collection services in cities
projects.description: Arduino board with ultrasonic sensors and wifi module to monitor the filling rate of containers, in real time and remotely, in order to optimize waste collection services
